ENTRY WEBHOOK ITEM

1. Webhook Name,without # typing,is free text for your management.It is not same name on Discord.
2. You can register the same Webhook URL multiple times.
In that case, we recommend using a Prefix.The prefix help you ( or bot ,AI ) searching posts within a single channel.
Example: If you set the prefix to "Job Log:", your message "Hello, Discord!" will be posted as "Job Log:Hello, Discord!".
Note: A trailing space in the prefix might be ignored depending on the environment.
WEBHOOK ITEMS
You can rename webhook name and prefix by clicking the edit icon.
However, If you want to change webhook URL, please delete the item and add again.
